results.title: Case Report and Literature Review: Bisphosphonate, Sirolimus, and Atenolol Treatment in a 4-Year-Old Child Diagnosed with Gorham-Stout Disease
results.text_hl: We report a 4-year-old with @DISEASE_Osteolysis_Essential @DISEASE_MESH:D010015 @@@Gorham-Stout disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Osteolysis_Essential @DISEASE_MESH:D010015 @@@GSD@@@) who was treated with a combination of @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@sirolimus@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. A previously healthy 4-year-old girl presented with @<m>DISEASE_Back_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001416 @@@back pain@@@ after falling on her back 2 months prior.

citations.NLM: Park SJ, Yoo JW, Ahn MB. Case Report and Literature Review: Bisphosphonate, Sirolimus, and Atenolol Treatment in a 4-Year-Old Child Diagnosed with Gorham-Stout Disease Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2023 Oct 23;16(10):. PMID: 37895975
